Package com.googlecode.jslint4java

Class Summary
Issue A single issue with the code that is being checked for problems.
Issue.IssueBuilder Allow creating an issue in a couple of different ways.
JSLint A utility class to check JavaScript source code for potential problems.
JSLintBuilder Construct JSLint instances.
Main A command line interface to JSLint.
OptionParser A utility class for turning option arguments from strings to typed values.
StringArray A convenient shim to allow creating an array from a comma separated list in a string.
 

Enum Summary
Option All available options for tuning the behaviour of JSLint.
